title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Theory-Based Microlearning Design for Higher Education Language Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply major learning theories (constructivism, cognitivism, etc.) to language education design.
Learners can design microlearning content structures (5–7 minutes per unit) optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can develop formative/summative assessment tools suitable for project-based evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
